name: Tanx n Stuff
overview: A four-player tank game created by Paul Atkin, Grant Young, Ben Campbell, Daniel Oaks. The game can be played by up to four people at a time - computer players hill fill in for any hissing human's, the aim of the game is to collect more flags than anyone else before the time limit expires, your vehicle can only carry three flags at a time so you must drop then back at your base before you can pick up more, Other players can attack you at any time and take the flags you here carrying or go to your base and steal them. There was both a playable demo and a full version of the game available via
